note.p: Chilean soldier and politician. Fought for Chilean independence from Spain. Governor of San Fernando, 1818 and 1828–9; mayor, 1821–2 and 1824. Intendant of the province of Colchagua, 1831–6.
Biblioteca del Congreso Nacional de Chile, https://www.bcn.cl/historiapolitica/resenas_parlamentarias/wiki/Feliciano_Silva (accessed 1 June 2021)
